description: CV update and enhancement with structured output for PDF generation

personal_info.name: Jane Doe
personal_info.summary: Accomplished marketing specialist with over 8 years of experience in digital strategy and brand management.

experience.title: Senior Marketing Manager
responsibilities: Led a team of 10 in developing digital marketing strategies that increased online engagement by 25%.
Implemented CRM tools that improved customer retention by 15%.

achievements: Awarded 'Marketer of the Year' by Marketing Association in 2022
Increased company's social media followers by 40% within a year

changes_made: Added new experience as Senior Marketing Manager at Tech Innovations Inc.
Updated summary section with current experience
suggestions: Consider adding additional certifications related to data analytics to enhance ATS ranking.
Expand network by participating in relevant industry forums and events.
